# Darcy Chatbot Testing Project

This project is designed for testing the Darcy chatbot in the test environment at https://aprender2teste.unb.br/my/.

## Project Context
- Target: Darcy chatbot testing
- Environment: https://aprender2teste.unb.br/my/
- Technologies: Python, Selenium, pytest, requests
- Purpose: Automated testing of chatbot interactions

## Instructions for Copilot
- Focus on web automation and chatbot testing patterns
- Use Python best practices for test automation
- Consider both UI testing (Selenium) and API testing approaches
- Structure tests for maintainability and reliability
